jd_information.description: Job Title / Designation:Sales ExecutivesJob Description:· Must have a work experience in travel industry for around 6 months to 1 year.· Must have good communication skills· Should be fluent with English as well as Hindi· Should have got little experience in inducing sales.· Customer Handling· Basic computer knowledge and efficiency in MS-Office.· Should be dedicated towards meeting the targets. Minimum/Maximum/ Work Experience Required: 0.6 - 1.5 Year Annual CTC:1.50 - 2 LPA Location(s) of Job:BTM Layout, Bengaluru Minimum Education Requirements:Graduate No of rounds of Interviews: 2 Number of Vacancies:1 Languages:English, Kannada
